body:
Comment 81: 
Daniel,
This morning I had a crash in one of the zfreebsd files. I don't know if that would have
anything to do with the question you have about the runtime, but maybe.
I'll try running it with the settings you described.

Remy and Mikioh,
My code uses unsafe only under Linux. BSD has a simpler way to get the real destination
on redirected connections.
Attachments: 1. crash Apr 11 0716.txt (48425 bytes)
